beranda.kritikSaran: Due to the process of developing a new look, we hereby notify you that the Jakarta Satu website is not accessible for temporary. You can submit criticisms and suggestions by clicking the button below.

penghargaan.penghargaanTab: Awards | Jakarta Satu (Satu Peta, Satu Data, Satu Kebijakan)
penghargaan.keterangan1: The Provincial Government of DKI Jakarta through the City Planning Information application (IRK) won the Best Innovation (Gold Trophy) in the innovation of utilizing geospatial information at the 2021 Bhumandala Award event. The City Planning Information Application (IRK) is one of the innovations for utilizing geospatial information developed on the Jakarta portal One as one of the efforts to improve geospatial-based public services that contain maps and urban planning information.
penghargaan.keterangan2:
Jakarta 3D Urban Regeneration - Kemayoran won first place in the 3D Map category from the Esri User Conference Map Gallery in 2021 based on an assessment by the Esri UC team.

Jakarta 3D Urban Regeneration - Kemayoran

3D Urban Kemayoran Jakarta map showing the Kemayoran Urban Design Guideline (UDGL) located in DKI Jakarta. This map visualizes: Existing 3D Buildings, 3D Building Plans, 3D Base Map, Tree Shade, Walkability and Population.
penghargaan.keterangan3:
It is an award for efforts to build geospatial information network nodes for Ministries/Institutions and Regional Governments that are considered the best in their efforts to prepare and build network nodes.
The Provincial Government of DKI Jakarta won 2 (two) awards, namely the Best Bhumandala Kanaka Node and the Best Bhumandala Kencana Geoportal in the Province category.
penghargaan.keterangan4: It is an award to support the Geospatial 4.0 industry for innovation in implementing GIS (Geographic Information System) to support Indonesia's One Map policy, organized by Esri Indonesia.
penghargaan.keterangan5: It is an award at the provincial level throughout Indonesia from the Geospatial Information Agency. The award was given to DKI Jakarta for having succeeded in building a good and active network node, and following the national geospatial reference system.

integrasiSistem.integrasiSistemTab: System Integration | Jakarta Satu (Satu Peta, Satu Data, Satu Kebijakan)
integrasiSistem.keterangan: The guidelines for updating and integrating map and data systems in the Jakarta One geospatial information system were prepared in order to facilitate the spatial integration of all regional apparatuses within the Provincial Government of DKI Jakarta or other agencies in order to realize the integration of geospatial information in the DKI Jakarta area within the Jakarta One container for improve the performance of urban planning and development.

footer.tentangSitusDetail: This site is a means of communication and visualization of maps and data from the Jakarta One program both for the Provincial Government of DKI Jakarta and for the community.
footer.hakCipta2: . Provincial Government of the Special Capital Region of Jakarta.
